caption:
This photograph depicts an industrial or construction site surrounded by a dramatic natural environment. In the foreground, rocky terrain stretches out, littered with various debris like pieces of wood, industrial materials, containers, and a large white canvas tent. Within this cluttered area, there are also splatters and puddles that reflect the light, suggesting recent rain or water use in the area.

Closer to the center, a crane extends out across a brownish body of water with patches of muddy, wet groundâ€”indicative of recent water level changes or disturbances from construction activities. A couple of large industrial machines or trucks can be seen near the crane, hinting at ongoing construction or excavation work.

The background features a stark, picturesque landscape with towering rocky mountains and cliffs under a cloudy sky, giving the scene a stark contrast between the natural beauty and the harshness of industrial impact. The body of water also reflects the gray of the sky, enhancing the somber mood of the setting.
title: Site of clean-up operations following a massive oil spill into the San Juan river.  This log boom in Monument Valley, Utah temporarily contained the spill.  Beside the oil company, 5 government agencies were involved in the clean-up.  Work went on around the clock; crews were relieved by helicopters based at oljato trading post.  Tent was the only shelter from the almost constant rain
